text: The Encounter of a Lifetime () is a 1952 Soviet drama movie directed by Nikolay Lebedev.НАВСТРЕЧУ ЖИЗНИНавстречу жизни (1952) It stars Nadezhda Rumyantseva, Vladimir Sokolov, and Georgi Semyonov. ==Actors== * Nadezhda Rumyantseva as Marusya Rodnikova * Vladimir Sokolov as Pasha Sychev * Georgi Semyonov as Semyon Ilyich * Sergei Gurzo as Vasov * Vasili Merkuryev * Anatoly Kuznetsov as Marusya's father == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1952 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Nikolay Lebedev
title: The Encounter of a Lifetime
